rules.description: ▊ Vim Mode (Highlights App, needs to be further top)
▊ Vim Mode Actions: hjklHJKLebG xCDiIaAoO<Esc> äÄ<Space><S-Space>

conditions.description: $ left out to match PWAs as well.

rules.description: 🐁 4 (hold): search selected text / open URL, (tap): send F13

to_if_held_down.shell_command: SEL=$(pbpaste) ; if [[ "$SEL" =~ ^[[:space:]]*http.*[[:space:]]*$ ]]; then open "$(echo "$SEL" | sed 's/ //g')" ; else open "https://www.google.com/search?q=$SEL" ; fi

manipulators.description: cmd+ö → activate (needed to make jk work) (cmd+opt+ö is set as Twitterific activation)

rules.description: Ⓜ️📖 Inoreader: v opens in background, switch jk & np

manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,

rules.description: 🛠 ß´ → [] (+ German to US Layout), s (hold) → ß

manipulators.description: Fix needed as Obsidian interprets alt-space as non-breaking space, which cannot be mapped. Therefore replaced with Shift-F12, which can be remapped in Obsidian's vimrc.

rules.description: 🐁 5 (hold): Look up word under cursor, (tap): send F16

conditions.description: Prevent footpedal from accidentally triggering twice.
